Group.name: Alkali metals
Group.Elements: Li, Na, K, Rb, Cs, Fr

Group.name: Alkaline earth metals
Group.Elements: Be, Mg, Ca, Sr, Ba, Ra

Group.name: Lanthanides
Group.Elements: La, Ce, Pr, Nd, Pm, Sm, Eu, Gd, Tb, Dy, Ho, Er, Tm, Yb, Lu

Group.name: Actinides
Group.Elements: Ac, Th, Pa, U, Np, Pu, Am, Cm, Bk, Cf, Es, Fm, Md, No, Lr

Group.name: Transition metals
Group.Elements: Sc, Ti, V, Cr, Mn, Fe, Co, Ni, Cu, Zn, Y, Zr, Nb, Mo, Tc, Ru, Rh, Pd, Ag, Cd, Hf, Ta, W, Re, Os, Ir, Pt, Au, Hg, Rf, Db, Sg, Bh, Hs

Group.name: Post-transition metals
Group.Elements: Tl, Pb, Bi, In, Sn, Al, Ga

Group.name: Metalloids
Group.Elements: B, Si, Ge, As, Sb, Te, Po

Group.name: Other nonmetals
Group.Elements: H, C, N, O, P, S, Se

Group.name: Noble gases
Group.Elements: He, Ne, Ar, Kr, Xe, Rn
